Tag_Youmay.description: daily contract | [[Fear of Arrows]], the weekly contract

General_Description: '''The Fear of Arrows''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Enemy]] [[archer]]s are too skilled to leave unscathed. They must be dealt with quickly. – Leader of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed Athenian archers in the region, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Dead Scouts for Healthy Sparta]] and [[Where Feathers Fall]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
